results.title: JPMorgan to Allow Bitcoin, Ether as Collateral in Crypto Push
results.description: JPMorgan plans to let institutional clients pledge BTC and ETH as loan collateral by year-end, deepening Wall Street’s integration with digital assets.

results.title: JPMorgan to Allow Clients to Pledge Bitcoin and Ether as Collateral: Bloomberg
results.description: CoinDesk echoes Bloomberg’s scoop: BTC and ETH holdings will be accepted as collateral for institutional loans at JPMorgan by year-end.

results.title: Crypto.com Joins Digital-Asset Firms Pursuing U.S. Bank Charters
results.description: Crypto.com is seeking a U.S. bank charter to expand custody and related services, underscoring a broader shift toward regulated structures.

results.title: Polymarket Will Launch Token and Airdrop After U.S. Relaunch, CMO Says
results.description: Prediction-market platform Polymarket plans a token and airdrop tied to its U.S. return via a regulated venue.

results.title: Crypto Markets Today: BTC Reclaims $110K as Softer CPI Lifts Sentiment
results.description: Bitcoin moved back above $110,000 after a cooler U.S. CPI print; ether and majors followed, though altcoins lagged.

results.title: Altcoin Market Falls $800B Short as Retail Traders Vanish
results.description: With liquidity thinning, altcoins remain far below prior cycle peaks; institutions focus on BTC and ETH while retail interest stays muted.

results.title: JPMorgan Upgrades Coinbase to Overweight, Citing New Monetization
results.description: JPMorgan raised Coinbase’s rating and target, pointing to Base, derivatives, and improved risk backdrop as drivers.

results.title: Trump Chooses Michael Selig for CFTC Chair, Report Says
results.description: The White House is set to nominate Michael Selig, a crypto-focused regulator, to lead the CFTC, signaling continued policy emphasis on digital assets.

results.title: Crypto Miner Draws $11B-Plus Orders in Blockbuster Junk-Bond Deal
results.description: A major bitcoin miner attracted outsized demand for a high-yield offering, highlighting investor appetite for mining and compute infrastructure.

results.title: CleanSpark Expands Into AI/HPC; Mining Stocks Rally
results.description: CleanSpark is building AI data-center capacity in Georgia and hiring leadership for its HPC push, joining peers diversifying beyond pure bitcoin mining.

results.title: Miner Weekly: Bitcoin Mining Leaderboard Shakes Up Ahead of Q3 Earnings
results.description: Fresh analysis shows shifts among top miners in hashrate, efficiency and treasury positions heading into earnings season.

results.title: Bitcoin Miner Debt Surges 500% in 12 Months: VanEck
results.description: Miners’ total debt ballooned from $2.1B to $12.7B as firms scale for AI and post-halving competition, per VanEck analysis.

results.title: Crypto sell-off wipes out $1.5 billion as investors liquidate positions
results.description: On Monday, a broad-based crypto sell-off led to $1.5B in liquidated positions; Bitcoin dropped ~3%, Ethereum ~9%, others sharper. Some see the correction as healthy amid crowded long positions.

results.title: China asks brokers to pause real-world asset business in Hong Kong, sources say
results.description: CSRC has advised Chinese brokerages to halt their real-world asset (RWA) tokenization operations in Hong Kong, citing risk concerns and need for legitimacy; reflects divergence in approach between mainland China and Hong Kong on digital assets.

results.title: UK and US set up task force to explore co-operation on digital assets regulation
results.description: The United Kingdom and United States have launched a joint “Task Force for Markets of the Future” to coordinate regulation of digital assets and capital markets, aiming to ease cross-border capital-raising and provide recommendations in about 180 days.

results.title: Dogecoin ETF to begin trading in 'watershed moment' for pro-crypto SEC
results.description: The first memecoin-backed ETF, the Rex-Osprey Doge ETF, has been approved by US regulators. Seen as a notable change in SEC’s stance; could open the door for more memecoin/NFT-based ETFs.

results.title: GPU Gold Rush: Why Bitcoin miners are powering AI’s expansion
results.description: Bitcoin mining firms are retooling energy-hungry facilities into AI data centers, shifting from ASICs to GPU clusters. AI contracts are providing more stable returns than volatile crypto mining amid rising energy and difficulty costs.

results.title: Bitcoin mining difficulty paints new ATH amid centralization fears
results.description: Bitcoin’s network difficulty just reached a new all-time high (~142.3 trillion), as hashrate surges. Smaller miners are increasingly squeezed, raising concerns about centralization.

results.title: Russian gov't rules out further regional crypto mining bans
results.description: Despite talk of new restrictions, the Russian government says there will be no more crypto mining bans in additional regions; current regulatory environment remains permissive.

results.title: SEC Approves Generic Listing Standards for Faster Crypto ETF Approvals
results.description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has approved generic listing standards that allow exchanges like NYSE, Nasdaq, and Cboe to list spot crypto ETFs more rapidly, without requiring individual case-by-case SEC approval. Products tied to assets like XRP, SOL, DOGE, etc., may benefit under the new rules.

results.title: Investors Flock to Bitcoin ETFs as Fed Eases and SEC Speeds Approval
results.description: Following a 25 basis point rate cut by the U.S. Federal Reserve to 4.25 %–4.50 % and the SEC’s recent regulatory changes easing listing standards, Bitcoin ETFs have seen heavy inflows (~20,685 BTC weekly). The smell of easier access and looser conditions is boosting demand.

results.title: Bitcoin Trades Near $116K, Ethereum Near $4,500 Ahead of U.S. Fed Decision
results.description: Bitcoin is trading around $116,000 after a modest rally, with Ethereum close to $4,500. Market analysts see building momentum ahead of an expected U.S. Federal Reserve rate cut.

results.title: India Keeps Crypto on the Financial Fringes, Neither Ban nor Full Legalization
results.description: India continues a cautious stance on crypto. The Reserve Bank of India favors limiting crypto’s role to financial periphery, while SEBI is more open to regulation. Despite high adoption among citizens, regulation remains uncertain.

results.title: Democrats in Congress Call Foul on Status of Trump’s Crypto-Czar David Sacks
results.description: Senator Elizabeth Warren and others are probing whether David Sacks has exceeded the 130-day limit for a “special government employee” in his role as crypto and AI czar, which may violate that employment status law.

results.title: Crypto Platform Bullish Wins New York BitLicense, Clearing Path for U.S. Expansion
results.description: Bullish, a digital asset platform, has been granted the BitLicense by the New York State Department of Financial Services. The license allows it to offer spot trading and custody services in NY, a major regulatory milestone.

results.title: Bitcoin Mining Crosses 1 Zettahash Benchmark; Miner Economics Under Strain
results.description: For the first time, the 14-day moving average hashrate for Bitcoin mining has crossed 1 ZH/s, marking a new milestone. But while hashrate is surging, miners are facing squeezed profit margins.

results.title: Bit Digital CEO Says Bitcoin Mining Industry “Dead in Two Years”
results.description: Sam Tabar, CEO of Bit Digital, claims that commercial Bitcoin mining will no longer be viable after the next halving, due to rising costs, difficulty, and shrinking margins.

results.title: Bitcoin Mining Stocks Outpace Bitcoin Itself as AI & HPC Reshape the Sector
results.description: Mining-adjacent equities (e.g. Iris Energy, TeraWulf) are significantly outperforming Bitcoin in 2025, driven by pivots toward AI/high-performance computing infrastructure, new cooling technology, and diversification.

results.title: Trump-backed mining firm American Bitcoin hits Nasdaq with $1.5 B valuation
results.description: American Bitcoin Corp, backed by Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr., debuted on Nasdaq. Shares soared to $14.52 then closed at $8.04, valuing their 20% stake at over $1.5 billion.

results.title: From coins to miners: Trump family expands deep into crypto sector
results.description: The Trump family’s crypto ventures span token launches, mining operations, stablecoins, memecoins and plans for crypto ETFs, intensifying scrutiny over conflicts of interest.

results.title: AI expansions fuel rallies for Bitcoin miners Iren and Cipher Mining
results.description: Iren (formerly Iris Energy) and Cipher Mining stocks surged as they pivot into AI, expanding GPU capacity and launching new data centers blending bitcoin mining with AI compute.

results.title: CFTC grants Polymarket relief; DeFi lending up 72% this year
results.description: The CFTC granted regulatory relief to Polymarket, while institutional demand has driven a 72% growth in DeFi lending this year.

results.title: Crypto exchange OKX fined €2.25M for operating in Netherlands without approval
results.description: The Dutch central bank fined OKX €2.25 million for offering services in the Netherlands without regulatory approval.

results.title: Venezuela allows USDT usage in private sector amid dollar shortages
results.description: With U.S. dollar scarcity, Venezuela increasingly permits USDT (Tether) in private-sector currency exchanges; businesses, including PDVSA, are shifting to crypto for payments.

results.title: American Bitcoin, backed by Trump sons, aims to start trading in September
results.description: American Bitcoin, a Bitcoin-mining company backed by Eric and Donald Trump Jr., is set to begin trading on Nasdaq via an all-stock merger with Gryphon Digital Mining under ticker ABTC.

results.title: Businesses Absorb BTC at Four Times Daily Miner Supply, Says River’s Research
results.description: River’s flow-map shows corporate Bitcoin inflows are near four times the rate of new miner supply, suggesting strong institutional demand.

results.title: Iren (Bitcoin Miner) Jumps 15% After Earnings and Nvidia Partner Status
results.description: Iren (formerly Iris Energy) saw its stock surge 15% after strong Q4 earnings and new status as an Nvidia preferred partner; it expanded mining capacity to 50 EH/s and added thousands of GPUs.

results.title: Community Near Texas Bitcoin Mine Pushes to Incorporate Over Noise Concerns
results.description: Residents near a MARA-operated Bitcoin mine in Texas hope to incorporate their community as-Mitchell Bend to enact stricter noise regulations, citing 24/7 drone noise despite mitigation efforts.

results.title: “No question Bitcoin hits $1M" — Eric Trump at BTC Asia 2025
results.description: Eric Trump, co-founder of American Bitcoin, said at the Bitcoin 2025 Asia conference that there is “no question” BTC will reach $1 million in the coming years.

results.title: Asia Morning Briefing: ETH Bulls Eyeing $5K as Flows Strengthen
results.description: Ethereum outperforms bitcoin as institutional inflows build; traders watch for a test of $5,000 with macro data ahead.

results.title: Crypto Markets Today: BTC Price Underperforms Ether; CRO Surges on Trump-Linked News
results.description: Bitcoin lagged ether while Cronos (CRO) outperformed on Trump-linked developments; volumes swelled as BTC and ETH hovered near key supports.

results.title: Ethereum Tops $4,900 to New All-Time High
results.description: Ether cleared $4,900 for the first time, entering price discovery amid shrinking exchange reserves and strong demand.

results.title: Bitcoin Hits Fresh Record on Fed Easing Bets
results.description: Bitcoin set another record in mid-August as bets on Federal Reserve easing and institutional demand supported prices.

results.title: Bitcoin Traders Eye Upside as BTC Holds Above $110K
results.description: Day-ahead outlook notes BTC basing above $110K as bulls look to break out into month end.

results.title: Bitcoin, XRP, and Ethereum Gain: 2 Ways Trump Is Boosting Cryptos
results.description: Macro hopes for lower rates and a Trump Media–Crypto.com deal around CRO helped lift major tokens, led by Cronos.

results.title: Analyst: SOL’s Powerful Rally Warrants Caution
results.description: Popular traders say Solana’s strength is notable but advise profit-taking near $205–$215 or waiting for clearer signals.

results.title: Cardano Gains as Market Bets on Rate Cuts Despite ETF Delay
results.description: ADA climbed on Aug 27 as traders looked past an ETF pause and positioned for potential Fed cuts.

results.title: XRP Jumps to Top Market Gainers; Futures OI Tops $1B
results.description: XRP led a broad crypto rebound, with CME futures OI crossing $1B as traders returned after a sell-off.

results.title: SEC Delays Multiple XRP ETF Decisions; Price Tests $2.90 Support
results.description: The SEC postponed rulings on several spot XRP ETFs until October, pressuring price into a key support zone.

results.title: Dogecoin Jumps to $0.21 Despite $200M Whale Transfer to Binance
results.description: DOGE weathered heavy whale flows to Binance and held near $0.21 after high-volume swings.

results.title: REX-Osprey Seeks SEC Approval for BNB Staking ETF
results.description: REX-Osprey filed for a BNB staking ETF, following the path set by recent Solana fund efforts.

results.title: BNB Climbs Above $810 as Buyers Target $815 Resistance
results.description: BNB pressed toward resistance with talk of institutional accumulation and rising volumes.

results.title: Toncoin Extends Rally as Telegram Launches Integrated TON Wallet for U.S. Users
results.description: Telegram’s rollout of TON wallet to U.S. users boosted Toncoin’s adoption and price momentum.

results.title: Kaspa Trapped in $0.082–$0.095 Range Amid Mixed Forecasts
results.description: Kaspa held in a tight range as traders debated breakout odds and watched key levels.

results.title: Kaspa Mining 2025: IceRiver Highlights Low-Cost Hosting as Key to ROI
results.description: IceRiver notes rising Kaspa difficulty and stresses low-cost, high-uptime power for KS5L/KS3M class ASICs to stay profitable.

results.title: Bitcoin Miners Say Times Are ‘Grim’ as Fee Drought Threatens Network
results.description: With transaction fees slumping, some miners warn of existential pressures and consolidation risks.

results.title: The Protocol: Bitcoin Mining Faces New Challenges as Power Costs Eat Profit
results.description: Rising energy costs and a tighter post-halving environment are squeezing miner margins.

results.title: Bitcoin Miner IREN Doubles GPU Fleet With $193M Blackwell Purchase to Accelerate AI Pivot
results.description: IREN bought 4,200 additional NVIDIA Blackwell B200 GPUs, doubling its HPC fleet to 8,500 as it expands into AI cloud services.

results.title: Hut 8 Surges on Plan to Add 1.5 GW, Expanding to 19 Sites
results.description: Hut 8 outlined plans to more than double power capacity with four new U.S. sites, sending shares higher.

results.title: Bitmain Hosts Global Hydro-Cooling Tour Event in Texas
results.description: Bitmain held a global hydro-cooling tour stop in Texas, showcasing liquid-cooling solutions to large-scale miners.
